description.oldValue:
Starting today, users can successfully join and participate in a meeting directly with their Teams Button on their Microsoft Teams certified peripheral. After a user receives a meeting start notification, the user can press the Teams Button to bring up their Meeting Pre-Join Screen. Now, a subsequent press of the Teams Button will allow the user to join the meeting!
GA date: April CY2023
description.newValue:
Starting today, users can successfully join and
participate in a meeting directly with their Teams Button on their Microsoft
Teams certified peripheral. After a user receives a meeting start notification,
the user can press the Teams Button to bring up their Meeting Pre-Join Screen.
Now, a subsequent press of the Teams Button will allow the user to join the
meeting!
